content: this pattern is part of the cotton hexagon collection a set of four tableware items coasters table mats place mats and a trivet make this cotton hexagon shaped trivet from worsted weight 100% cotton yarn this is a relaxing home decor crochet project ideal for a hand-made gift or a quick make for selling at craft fayres this simple modern trivet is crocheted in the round holding the yarn double into a solid hexagon shape the yarn chosen for this project is excellent quality widely available and offered in lots of neutral bright and pastel colours added to this the yarn is machine washable and dryable for easy care perfect for beginners or if you are looking for a fast and easy project
